pr_title: refactor(e2e): Fix e2e test swallowing an exception, remove needless …

timeline.message:
refactor(e2e): Fix e2e test swallowing an exception, remove needless confirmOpenStabilized calls

confirmOpenStabilized used to be used when open calls were less reliable, but now they are reliable so we can get rid of them

timeline.bodyText: I see confirmOpenStabilized being referenced in waitForStabilizedConnection, is that required?
timeline.author: bikamani

replies.bodyText: Yes, that is used during our error injection tests so that the test waits for the error injection period to end
replies.author: timtay-microsoft
